title: Thorough Documentation Review for Compliance
task: Study ALFRED’s documentation thoroughly to ensure compliance
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to study ALFRED’s documentation thoroughly so I can build secure, compliant healthcare apps that respect strict data privacy.
decomposition: Provide comprehensive and detailed ALFRED documentation
Ensure documentation covers security best practices for app development
Include clear guidelines on complying with strict data privacy regulations

title: Enforce Accessibility Compliance on App Submission
task: Balance app features with ALFRED’s accessibility standards
summary: As a developer, I want to enforce strict accessibility compliance on my app to ensure inclusive user experiences while fully controlling user data and security.
decomposition: Enforce strict accessibility standards on all submitted apps
Ensure apps provide inclusive user experiences for diverse abilities
Allow developers full control over user data and app security

title: Friendly and Informal Voice Interaction
task: Prefers ALFRED to communicate in a friendly, informal tone
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to use friendly, informal language so I feel comfortable and eager to learn how to use it.
decomposition: Use friendly language in voice interaction
Use informal language style in voice interaction
Ensure voice interaction encourages user comfort and learning

title: Control Over App Updates and Data Collection
task: Resist app-imposed mandatory updates and data collection that disrupt care
summary: As a registered nurse, I want to block mandatory app updates and data collection during work hours to avoid distractions and stay focused on patient care.
decomposition: Block mandatory app updates during work hours
Prevent data collection during work hours
Avoid distractions to maintain focus on patient care during work hours

title: Express Frustration on Disabled Alerts
task: Express frustration when non-critical alerts and interactive modes are disabled
summary: As a registered nurse, I want ALFRED to remain silent and not signal frustration when non-critical alerts and interactive modes are disabled, so that my clinical focus is not distracted.
decomposition: Remain silent when non-critical alerts are disabled
Do not signal frustration when interactive modes are disabled
Avoid distracting the nurse's clinical focus

title: Use Formal and Direct Onboarding Communication
task: Use a formal and direct communication style during onboarding
summary: As a registered nurse, I want ALFRED to use formal, direct communication during onboarding to quickly configure clinical settings without distractions.
decomposition: Use formal language during onboarding communication
Communicate directly to avoid ambiguity in onboarding
Minimize distractions during clinical settings configuration

title: Reject Challenging Cognitive Games
task: Rejects cognitive games that involve physical movement or feel challenging
summary: As an older person, I want to avoid all challenging cognitive games and physical exercises to prevent discomfort and stress.
decomposition: Exclude all cognitive games classified as challenging
Exclude all physical exercises classified as challenging
Prevent discomfort and stress caused by difficult activities

title: Strict Privacy and Minimal Interaction
task: Evaluates ALFRED’s features with skepticism, especially regarding privacy
summary: As an older adult, I want to block all data sharing and dismiss almost all notifications and explanations, so that I can feel safe and avoid overwhelming technology.
decomposition: Block all data sharing with external parties
Dismiss almost all system notifications
Avoid providing explanations or detailed information to the user

title: Respect Personal Boundaries in Cognitive Games
task: Ensures ALFRED respects personal boundaries even if it limits benefit
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to never start cognitive activities unless I ask, to avoid unsolicited challenges and protect my privacy.
decomposition: Do not start cognitive activities automatically without user initiation
Require explicit user request before launching any cognitive challenge
Protect user privacy by avoiding unsolicited cognitive activity prompts

title: Manual Configuration Without Defaults
task: Configures ALFRED personally without accepting automatic settings
summary: As an older adult I want to personally configure ALFRED without any automatic settings to prevent unwanted features and completely block data sharing.
decomposition: Allow users to manually configure all ALFRED settings without automatic defaults
Prevent ALFRED from enabling any features automatically without user consent
Completely block all data sharing unless explicitly authorized by the user

title: Accept Only Gentle Cognitive Activities
task: Accepts only tailored cognitive activities that do not trigger pessimism or resistance
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to only suggest very gentle cognitive activities that do not challenge or pressure me, so I can use it without feeling overwhelmed or resistant.
decomposition: Suggest only cognitive activities that are very gentle
Avoid cognitive activities that challenge or pressure the user
Ensure cognitive activities do not cause feelings of overwhelm or resistance

title: Encourage Controlled Engagement with Olivia
task: Desires increased engagement of Olivia with the system to improve wellbeing
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want ALFRED to prompt Olivia gently and respect her privacy, so I can support her wellbeing without causing distress or violating trust.
decomposition: Prompt Olivia gently without causing distress
Respect Olivia's privacy in all interactions
Support wellbeing without violating trust

title: Gentle Activity Reminders for Reluctant Users
task: Uses ALFRED’s interactive features to gently remind Olivia about activities
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want ALFRED to provide activity reminders that respect my clients' privacy and autonomy without being intrusive, so I can support their engagement gently.
decomposition: Provide activity reminders that respect user privacy
Ensure activity reminders do not intrude on user autonomy
Deliver reminders in a gentle, non-intrusive manner
